configure_logging.name: configure_logging
configure_logging.description: Configure structured logging for production use.

profile.name: profile
profile.description: Serves the user profile page for password management.

admin_phone_numbers.name: admin_phone_numbers
admin_phone_numbers.description: Serves the page for managing phone numbers.

admin_workers.name: admin_workers
admin_workers.description: Serves the page for managing workers.

admin_users.name: admin_users
admin_users.description: Serves the page for managing users.

admin_roles.name: admin_roles
admin_roles.description: Serves the page for managing roles.

admin_provision_wizard.name: admin_provision_wizard
admin_provision_wizard.description: Serves the multi-step phone provisioning wizard page.

admin_import_csv.name: admin_import_csv
admin_import_csv.description: Serves the CSV data import page.

support_dashboard.name: support_dashboard
support_dashboard.description: Serves the main helpdesk dashboard for Support staff.

integration_dashboard.name: integration_dashboard
integration_dashboard.description: Serves the dashboard for Integration Managers to see their requests.

integration_new_request.name: integration_new_request
integration_new_request.description: Serves the form for an Integration Manager to request a new phone.

manage_roles.name: manage_roles
manage_roles.description: API endpoint to get all roles or create a new role.

get_users.name: get_users
get_users.description: API endpoint to get all users with role information.

create_user.name: create_user
create_user.description: API endpoint to create a new user.

update_user.name: update_user
update_user.description: API endpoint to update an existing user.

handle_role.name: handle_role
handle_role.description: API endpoint to get or update a specific role.

change_password.name: change_password
change_password.description: Allows users to change their own password. Requires current password validation for security.

provision_validate_phone.name: provision_validate_phone
provision_validate_phone.description: Validates that a phone exists and is in stock for provisioning.

provision_get_available_assets.name: provision_get_available_assets
provision_get_available_assets.description: Gets lists of available SIMs and Workers for assignment.

provision_finalize.name: provision_finalize
provision_finalize.description: Finalizes the provisioning process, creating the assignment and logs.

import_csv.name: import_csv
import_csv.description: API endpoint to handle CSV file upload and database processing.

manager_dashboard.name: manager_dashboard
manager_dashboard.description: Serves the main dashboard for Managers.

manager_tickets.name: manager_tickets
manager_tickets.description: Serves the page for a manager to view their submitted tickets.

manager_ticket_detail.name: manager_ticket_detail
manager_ticket_detail.description: Serves the detailed ticket view page for a manager.

manager_create_ticket.name: manager_create_ticket
manager_create_ticket.description: Serves the create ticket page for a manager.

get_manager_team_status.name: get_manager_team_status
get_manager_team_status.description: API endpoint to get the status of all workers and their assigned assets for the currently logged-in manager.

get_manager_selectable_phones.name: get_manager_selectable_phones
get_manager_selectable_phones.description: API endpoint to get all phones assigned to workers under the current manager, formatted for ticket creation dropdown.

get_manager_tickets.name: get_manager_tickets
get_manager_tickets.description: API endpoint to get all tickets submitted by the current manager.

get_manager_ticket_details.name: get_manager_ticket_details
get_manager_ticket_details.description: API endpoint for a manager to get details for a specific ticket they reported. Internal notes are filtered out for security.

add_manager_comment.name: add_manager_comment
add_manager_comment.description: API endpoint for managers to add comments to their tickets.

resolve_manager_ticket.name: resolve_manager_ticket
resolve_manager_ticket.description: API endpoint for managers to mark their tickets as resolved.

handle_phone_numbers.name: handle_phone_numbers
handle_phone_numbers.description: API endpoint to get all phone numbers or create a new one.

handle_phone_number.name: handle_phone_number
handle_phone_number.description: API endpoint to get, update, or delete a specific phone number.

get_secteurs.name: get_secteurs
get_secteurs.description: API endpoint to get a list of all secteurs.

get_workers.name: get_workers
get_workers.description: API endpoint to get a list of all active workers with their sector name.

create_worker.name: create_worker
create_worker.description: API endpoint to create a new worker.

update_worker.name: update_worker
update_worker.description: API endpoint to update an existing worker.

delete_worker.name: delete_worker
delete_worker.description: API endpoint to 'delete' a worker by setting their status to 'Inactive'.

get_all_active_tickets.name: get_all_active_tickets
get_all_active_tickets.description: API endpoint for Support to get all tickets that are not yet solved or closed.

create_ticket.name: create_ticket
create_ticket.description: API endpoint for Managers to create new support tickets.

support_ticket_detail.name: support_ticket_detail
support_ticket_detail.description: Serves the detailed view page for a single support ticket.

support_all_tickets.name: support_all_tickets
support_all_tickets.description: Serves the page for viewing all tickets, including history.

admin_reports.name: admin_reports
admin_reports.description: Serves the main reporting page for Administrators.

get_ticket_details.name: get_ticket_details
get_ticket_details.description: API endpoint to get all details for a single ticket, including phone, worker, and all historical updates.

update_ticket_properties.name: update_ticket_properties
update_ticket_properties.description: API endpoint for Support to update a ticket's core properties like status, priority, or assignment.

add_ticket_update.name: add_ticket_update
add_ticket_update.description: API endpoint for Support to post a new update (comment) to a ticket.

get_support_users.name: get_support_users
get_support_users.description: API endpoint for Support role to get list of all support users for ticket assignment.

get_assignment_overview.name: get_assignment_overview
get_assignment_overview.description: Provides a comprehensive overview of all current assignments, joining workers, phones, SIMs, and phone numbers.

get_missing_data_report.name: get_missing_data_report
get_missing_data_report.description: Comprehensive report to identify missing or incomplete data across the system.

get_inventory_summary.name: get_inventory_summary
get_inventory_summary.description: Provides a comprehensive inventory summary with counts and availability.

get_summary_stats.name: get_summary_stats
get_summary_stats.description: Provides key summary statistics for the admin dashboard.

get_dashboard_charts.name: get_dashboard_charts
get_dashboard_charts.description: Provides chart data for interactive dashboard visualizations.

get_worker_assignments.name: get_worker_assignments
get_worker_assignments.description: Provides a list of all active workers and their currently assigned assets.

get_asset_lifecycle.name: get_asset_lifecycle
get_asset_lifecycle.description: Get complete lifecycle history for a phone by asset tag or serial number. This provides a chronological timeline of all events for auditing and tracking.

return_assignment.name: return_assignment
return_assignment.description: Handles the return of an asset from a worker. Sets the assignment's return_date, updates asset statuses, and logs the event.

admin_import.name: admin_import
admin_import.description: Serves the CSV import wizard page.

import_preview.name: import_preview
import_preview.description: Handles CSV upload, reads headers and first 5 rows for preview.

import_get_schema.name: import_get_schema
import_get_schema.description: Returns the column names and details for a given table.

import_process.name: import_process
import_process.description: Processes the CSV data based on user-defined mappings.

migrate_timestamps.name: migrate_timestamps
migrate_timestamps.description: Migration endpoint to add timestamp columns to phones table.

get_phone_history.name: get_phone_history
get_phone_history.description: API endpoint to get the asset history log for a specific phone.

get_worker_history.name: get_worker_history
get_worker_history.description: API endpoint to get the ticket and assignment history for a specific worker.

get_all_tickets_history.name: get_all_tickets_history
get_all_tickets_history.description: API endpoint for Support to get ALL tickets, including solved and closed.

initiate_phone_swap.name: initiate_phone_swap
initiate_phone_swap.description: Logs that a replacement phone is being sent and sets ticket to Pending.

manager_confirm_receipt.name: manager_confirm_receipt
manager_confirm_receipt.description: Allows a Manager to confirm receipt of a new phone and provide return details.

get_integration_requests.name: get_integration_requests
get_integration_requests.description: API endpoint to get all phone requests submitted by the current integration manager.

create_phone_request.name: create_phone_request
create_phone_request.description: API endpoint for an Integration Manager to submit a new phone request.
